short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover profitable topics for your next book. Go to Amazon, search a topic & KIP Scout will calculate its potential profitability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover profitable book topics for your next bestseller!

KIP Scout provides a clear snapshot of competitive sales metrics, potential earnings, and essential insights to guide your publishing decisions.

If you want to know what books will sell, add KIP Scout to your browser. And it's completely FREE.

ðŸ’° Customize your profitability criteria: Not everyone has the same definition of "profitability" so customize the indicators to your liking.

ðŸ“± Accurate, up-to-date sales data: KIP Scout will validate data so sales volume and revenue metrics are as accurate and up-to-date as possible.

ðŸ”„ Flexible, shareable settings: Include or exclude sponsored listings data, customize your interface, and export or share your profitability criteria with others.

ðŸ’¾ Save your research with a click: All sales, Best Seller Rank, descriptions, ratings can be saved into Dibbly Create's platform with a click. And it's free to use.

ðŸ“– In-page product summary: Navigate to any book and instantly get Best Seller Rankings, estimated sales and revenue numbers without even clicking a button.

Dibbly is a self-publishing platform that combines AI tools and human talent to deliver quality books quickly, and affordably.  Use Dibbly Create AI for anything from advanced book topic research, to ideation and generating outlines, to writing and formatting your book. As well, work with any of our 5000+ talented freelancers to help you with any stage of your publishing journey: writing, editing, formatting, cover design and much more.
